org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure

Class LocalCoauthorsGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure.LocalCoauthorsGraph

  • public class LocalCoauthorsGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the 1-hop coauthor neighborhood of a given reference person. The nodes of the neighborhood are clustered into connected components according to their coauthor relation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected AbstractCoauthorGraph dblp
      The dblp coauthor graph.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalCoauthorsGraph(AbstractCoauthorGraph dblp, Person center)
      Creates the local coauthor graph of the 1-hop neighborhood for the given reference center.

      Retrieve the center person of this local coauthor graph.

      Retrieve the coauthor community of the given index.

        Returns:
